Class planting

    • Core.planting

  • public class planting
extends java.lang.Object
    ML.Player - Planting Controller

    - Planting controller is shown till the user havn't completed it fully.

    Version:
    0.2c

    Class-wise Change Log: 0.1c -> 0.2c

    - Formal Documentation added

    - finalize() tweaking = true;

    Author:
    msahil432

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Creates object of three planting frames, one by one.

        Uses cancelled and boolean plantingx.done to determine whether continue the flow or exit.
